Subject: Re: How tall is your character?

I have added in our characters to the size chart that I have placed on
the club files section, please feel free to look it over when you have
time.

http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/files/

The characters we have created all should have a '*' next to them for
easy identification. The only modification was of Hydras. I made him a
'Super' on the order of Optimal Optimus since they both had the
twinned spark thing going. Maurauder is another in that group since he
is actually a spark twin of Hydras with another thrown in the mix.

So at the moment you should only have 3 Supers: Optimal Optimus,
Hydras and Maurader. Vorpal would be an unknown as of yet since he has
not been seen. However we can assume that he is larger than anyone
else.

Questions, comments?

Preston
